wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Stewart "Matt" Yates (born 4 February 1969 in Rochford, Essex) is a male retired English athlete who specialised in the middle-distance events.

link_mentions.page: Athletics at the 1992 Summer Olympics – Men's 1500 metres

response: Crabb returned to the Olympic games to run in the 1992 Olympic 1500 metres. Also representing Great Britain were Kevin McKay and Matthew Yates.
